abstract: Mr. Murphy is the latest investment banker to depart Barclays, which is seeking to reduce the size of its investment bank in response to stiffer regulations.
snippet: Mr. Murphy is the latest investment banker to depart Barclays, which is seeking to reduce the size of its investment bank in response to stiffer regulations.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has named Jeremy Murphy a managing director in its consumer and retail investment banking group for the Americas. Mr. Murphy is the latest investment banker to leave Barclays, which is seeking to reduce the size of its investment bank in response to stiffer regulations.

headline.main: Jeremy Murphy Leaves Barclays for Bank of America
